SHORT_DESCR.P: Each of STW, STS, and DVW wish to award Framework agreements for the provision of Apprenticeship Training Programmes for levels 3 and above and level 2. The provision requires design and delivery of training content and courses. This includes accommodation for all eligible apprentices, as well as safeguarding at the accommodation site for those who are under 18. Travel to and from the accommodation site and the training location must also be provided. Standards and full requirements are provided in the tender documents. It is intended that the EU Advert and the pre-qualification stage will run concurrently and that interested parties must register their company through the Bravo tool and add themselves to Project_618 Apprenticeship Training Programme Tender as a bidder in order to review all tender / procurement documents and submit a response to the pre-qualification questionnaire.

LOT_COMBINING_CONTRACT_RIGHT.P: — Lot 1 will consist of the Apprenticeship Training Programme for level 3 and above,
— Lot 2 will consist of level 2 and lot 3 is the requirements of lot 1 and 2 combined.
For full details see the procurement documents. The participant must apply for each lot separately. Refer to the procurement documents for further information.
Bravo reference Project_618 - Apprenticeship Training Programme Tender.

MAIN_SITE.P: UKG1, UKG2, UKG3, UKF1, UKF2, UKK1, UKL2, UKF3, and UKE3.

SHORT_DESCR.P: STW, STS, and DVW wish to award framework agreements for the provision of Apprenticeship Training Programmes, including design and delivery of apprenticeship courses for level 3 and above.
This lot includes, but is not limited to the following training for role types listed and will consist of level 3 and above training as exampled below:
— Level 3 Maintenance Engineering Technician,
— Level 3 Water Process Technician,
— Higher / Degree / Level 7 apprenticeship in Engineering to cover mechanical, electrical and civil engineering,
— higher apprenticeship in Water Operations.
The successful bidders must also provide accommodation for all eligible apprentices and the safeguarding at the accommodation sites for apprentices who are under the age of 18.
The requirement includes the provision of travel to and from the accommodation site and the training locations for all apprentices. Refer to procurement documents for full details.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: Extension options of up to 24 months in total. Further details set out in the procurement documents.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: STW, STS, and DVW will set out within the tender documents options they wish to consider in relation to client or supplier provision of accommodation and / or travel in connection with the service provision.

The Utilities Contracts Regulations 2016 provide for aggrieved parties who have been harmed or at risk of harm to take action in the High Court of England and Wales.
